caseStudies.title: Portfolio Agent
caseStudies.intro: An interactive conversational agent embedded in Carlota’s portfolio, designed to let site visitors explore her work more efficiently.
caseStudies.problem: Traditional portfolios often feel dense, and are time consuming to go through. Users need a more engaging, guided way to discover her projects and personality.
caseStudies.challenge: Balance technical constraints of platforms like Voiceflow with the design vision for fluid recruiter-friendly interactions. Ensure both button-driven and free-text flows feel seamless.
caseStudies.constraints: Platform quirks and limitations in Voiceflow’s new UI.
caseStudies.solutions: Created a dynamic agent that introduces Carlota, shares skills, favorites, and fun facts, and lets users dive into projects. Designed prompts to vary phrasing for naturalness, and engineered JSON consistency for scalable project summaries.
caseStudies.process: 1 - Defined recruiter use cases; 2 - Structured JSON for flexible data capture; 3 - Built flows with Capture + Condition + Button logic; 4 - Iterated prompts for recruiter-friendly tone.

caseStudies.title: Security Exchange Platform
caseStudies.intro: A platform for asset owners to track compliance with industry standards in real time and share security requirements with partners transparently.
caseStudies.problem: The client brought only a conceptual idea. No features, no flows, and a domain full of heavy cybersecurity and compliance jargon.
caseStudies.challenge: Translate a vague vision into a usable, multi-user platform; design for a field the team had no prior knowledge of; ensure clarity for both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
caseStudies.constraints: No formal user research budget; multiple user types with overlapping workflows
caseStudies.solutions: Multi-user role-based dashboard that prioritized critical compliance alerts; submission system with status tracking to reduce ambiguity; unified design system ensuring visual consistency across future modules; delivered full, dev ready prototype used for investor pitches and stakeholder onboarding.
caseStudies.process: 1 - Rapid onboarding; 2 - Information architecture; 3 - Wireframing and prototyping; 4 - UI design and design system
